attributes.action: Reject right of live and work eastern Europeans
attributes.additional_details:
According with my experience most polish who came to UK are trouble maker and are bad for Britain.  They are liar and they discriminate against other and they don't do their job properly. and also they are extremely rude, and they use false accusation. I want my medical record but the Polish and Hungarian girls who work in reception don't provide my medical record. Also I was working in factories with poles but they were harassing me.
ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.
please send eastern European back
Thanks
